# Mentored (Trait)
## Overview
**Mentored**: A tutor or private instructor guided you in learning your art, profession, or trade, and through your education, you became capable of teaching and guiding others. Choose a single [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]], [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]], or [[Profession (Skill)|Profession]] skill. You gain a +1 trait bonus on checks with that skill. You also gain a +1 trait bonus when you aid anotherâ€™s skill check with any skill. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 60
